The location = "" statement removes the highlighting from any of the menu's entries. The page script saves the navigation style, to use it later.

section.description: The page header section loads a standard Alpha Five JavaScript file that is used on a link to open a popup page.

The A5W_INCLUDE() statement is in the top row of the table. It loads TOPPAGE.A5W and displays a standard page header. The style saved earlier is applied to the body of the page. This code uses the style of the dialog to style the prompt to enter user ID and password. Login to the System

A link is added at the bottom of the page to open the LOGINLIST.A5W page as a popup. This is added for testing only to show a list of current registered users in the security system. On a real system, the following line would be removed.
